mapper.select: select distinct m.perms from role r left join user_role ur on (r.role_id = ur.role_id) left join user u on (u.user_id = ur.user_id) left join role_menu rm on (rm.role_id = r.role_id) left join menu m on (m.menu_id = rm.menu_id) where u.user_name = #{userName} and m.perms is not null and m.perms <> ''
